title: The Service Firewall
coreTruth: Service is a Choice. Servitude is a Debt.

signal.title: The Mechanic
signal.content: A mechanic working calmly while chaos hits an invisible shield. Voiceover: 'You can fix the engine without drinking the oil.'

academy.title: The Physics of Infection
academy.content: Empathy is feeling the vibe. Servitude is absorbing it. Compassion is seeing the pain but refusing the debt.

guild.title: The Return to Sender
steps: Verbal Mirror: 'I cannot receive the info when delivered like that.'
The Mantra: Access is a privilege, not a right.

nexus.title: Book #6: The Big Angel
nexus.quote: I served men who were murderers... but I never let their darkness become my darkness. I kept the gate.
